author: xTuple <dev@xtuple.com>
name: xtuple
description: xTuple Enterprise Resource Planning Mobile-Web client private extensions

scripts.build-basic-manufacturing-empty: cd ../xtuple; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgempty --databaseonly -e foundation-database -i -s foundation-database/empty_data.sql; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgempty -e ../private-extensions/source/inventory/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgempty -e ../private-extensions/source/manufacturing/foundation-database -f --databaseonly;
scripts.build-basic-manufacturing-quickstart: cd ../xtuple; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgquickstart --databaseonly -e foundation-database -i -s foundation-database/empty_data.sql; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgquickstart -e ../private-extensions/source/inventory/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d mfgquickstart -e ../private-extensions/source/manufacturing/foundation-database -f --databaseonly;
scripts.build-basic-distribution-empty: cd ../xtuple; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distempty --databaseonly -e foundation-database -i -s foundation-database/empty_data.sql; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distempty -e ../private-extensions/source/inventory/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distempty -e ../private-extensions/source/distribution/foundation-database -f --databaseonly;
scripts.build-basic-distribution-quickstart: cd ../xtuple; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distquickstart --databaseonly -e foundation-database -i -s foundation-database/empty_data.sql; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distquickstart -e ../private-extensions/source/inventory/foundation-database -f --databaseonly; ./scripts/build_app.js -d distquickstart -e ../private-extensions/source/distribution/foundation-database -f --databaseonly;
